p: The results of Rancimat test showed that the control sample without any antioxidants had the lowest induction period (11.91 hr); this was followed by T. carmanicus (12.72 hr), M. communis (12.12 hr), and BHA (13.06 hr). The greatest shelf‐life was found in the TBHQ group (38.42 hr). As a result, the addition of each of T. carmanicus or M. comminnus essential oils, as well the synthetic antioxidants (BHA and TBHQ), could increase the shelf‐life of sunflower oil significantly ( p < .05).
